outputs.output_descr: The project builds on the current status and achievements of Kazakhstan with respect to biodiversity planning and reporting. It aims to integrate Kazakhstan's obligations under the CBD into its national development and sectoral planning frameworks through a renewed and participative 'biodiversity planning' and strategizing process. This process is expected to produce measurable targets for biodiversity conservation and sustainable use.

project_descr: National Biodiversity Planning to Support the implementation of the Covention on Biological Diversity 2011-2020 Strategic Plan in Republic of Kazakhstan
